title: Ion AmpliSeq Library Prep 4/4: Library Purification
author: Opentrons
description:
Links:
 Part 1: DNA Target Amplification
 Part 2: Partially Digest Amplicons
 Part 3: Ligate Adapters
 Part 4: Library Purification

You will need:
 P300 Multi-channel Pipette
 Aluminum Block Set
 Twin.tec skirted PCR Plate
 PCR Strip Tubes
 12-well Trough
 Neptune 10 uL Filter Tips
process:
Input the number of samples you are processing. (MAX=24)
Download your protocol.
Upload your protocol into the OT App.
Set up your deck according to the deck map.
Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our support article.
Hit "Run".
Robot will transfer 45 uL AMPure XP Beads to each sample.
Robot will engage the Magnetic Module and remove supernatant.
Robot will wash the plate with 150 uL 70% ethanol.
Robot will remove supernatant and dry the plate for 5 minutes.
Robot will transfer elution buffer to the samples.
Robot will transfer supernatant to a new plate.
notes:
Place the sample plate on the Magnetic Module to begin the protocol.

Trough:
 AMPure XP Beads: A1
 70% Ethanol: A2
* Elution Buffer: A3

Clean Twin.tec skirted PCR Plate: slot 1

If you have any questions about this protocol, please contact protocols@opentrons.com.

You will need:
* [P300 Multi-channel Pipette](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/ot-2-pipettes/products/8-channel-electronic-pipette?variant=5978988707869)
* [Aluminum Block Set](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/hardware-modules/products/aluminum-block-set)
* [Twin.tec skirted PCR Plate](https://www.fishersci.com/shop/products/eppendorf-96-well-twin-tec-pcr-plates-yellow-skirted-150-l/e951020427)
* PCR Strip Tubes
* 12-well Trough
* Neptune 10 uL Filter Tips
markdown.process:
1. Input the number of samples you are processing. (MAX=24)
2. Download your protocol.
3. Upload your protocol into the [OT App](https://opentrons.com/ot-app).
4. Set up your deck according to the deck map.
5. Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our [support article](https://support.opentrons.com/ot-2/getting-started-software-setup/deck-calibration).
6. Hit "Run".
7. Robot will transfer 45 uL AMPure XP Beads to each sample.
8. Robot will engage the Magnetic Module and remove supernatant.
9. Robot will wash the plate with 150 uL 70% ethanol.
10. Robot will remove supernatant and dry the plate for 5 minutes.
11. Robot will transfer elution buffer to the samples.
12. Robot will transfer supernatant to a new plate.
markdown.notes:
Place the sample plate on the Magnetic Module to begin the protocol.

---

Trough:
* AMPure XP Beads: A1
* 70% Ethanol: A2
* Elution Buffer: A3

---

Clean Twin.tec skirted PCR Plate: slot 1
